          <title>
            <string language="sl">Fonomimična metoda: Primer učnega lista (črka Z)</string>
            <string language="en">Letter Z</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zeichen Z</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Lettre Z</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Letra Z</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Lettera Z</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Γράμμα ζ</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Letra Z</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">To je primer učnega lista, s pomočjo katerega učenci spoznajo fonomimični znak za posamezne črke.</string>
            <string language="en">Example of phonomimic method to learn letter Z.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">fonomimična metoda</string>
            <string language="en">phonomimic method</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">črka</string>
            <string language="en">letter</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">z</string>
            <string language="en">z</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Beispiel der phonomimic Methode, zum von von 
Zeichen Z zu erlernen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Exemple de la méthode phonomimic pour apprendre 
la lettre Z.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Exemplo do método phonomimic para aprender a 
letra Z.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Esempio del metodo phonomimic per imparare 
lettera Z.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Παράδειγμα της phonomimic μεθόδου για να μάθει το 
γράμμα ζ.</string>
          </description>

letra Z.</string>
